description:
The Collapse transition is used by the
[Vertical Stepper](/components/steppers/#vertical-stepper) StepContent component.
It uses [react-transition-group](https://github.com/reactjs/react-transition-group) internally.

children.description: The content node to be collapsed.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

collapsedHeight.description: The height of the container when collapsed.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

in.description: If `true`, the component will transition in.

timeout.description:
The duration for the transition, in milliseconds.
You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.

Set to 'auto' to automatically calculate transition time based on height.

name: Collapse

descriptions.container: Styles applied to the container element.
descriptions.entered: Styles applied to the container element when the transition has entered.
descriptions.hidden: Styles applied to the container element when the transition has exited and `collapsedHeight` != 0px.
descriptions.wrapper: Styles applied to the outer wrapper element.
descriptions.wrapperInner: Styles applied to the inner wrapper element.
